label: New
description: Ticket has been issued but not yet assigned to a staff member.

label: Assigned
description: A staff member has taken ownership of this ticket and will process it.

label: Payment Sent
description: Payment details have been sent to the attendee. Awaiting payment.

label: Paid
description: Payment has been confirmed by staff. Ticket is ready for boarding.

label: Boarded
description: Attendee has been checked in at the event entrance.
